title: 115_hr4267
content: Small Business Credit Availability Act This bill amends the Investment Company Act of 1940 to reduce the required asset-coverage ratio applicable to a Business Development Company (BDC) from 200 to 150 if: (1)nbsp. The BDC makes specified disclosures on its website and to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), and (2)nbsp. The modified asset-coverage ratio is approved by the required majority of the BDC's directors, general partners, or shareholders . The SECnbsp. Must allow BDCs to use securities offering and proxy rules that are available to other issuers.
